manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Integrates CVS actions into IDE workflow.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Introduces project level CVS versioning actions. These streamline typical team development cycle: diff, update, edit, build, diff and commit.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.jdesktop.layout/1, org.netbeans.api.progress/1 > 1.0, org.netbeans.api.xml/1, org.netbeans.lib.cvsclient/1 > 1.14.2, org.netbeans.libs.jsch/1 > 0.1.20, org.netbeans.modules.diff/1 = 42, org.netbeans.modules.editor/3 > 1.19, org.netbeans.modules.editor.errorstripe/2 = 1, org.netbeans.modules.editor.fold/1, org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib/1 > 1.3, org.netbeans.modules.editor.mimelookup/1, org.netbeans.modules.editor.settings/1, org.netbeans.modules.masterfs/1 > 1.2, org.netbeans.modules.projectapi/1, org.netbeans.modules.projectuiapi/1, org.netbeans.modules.queries/1 > 1.4, org.netbeans.modules.versioning/1 > 1.1, org.openide.awt > 6.0, org.openide.dialogs > 6.0, org.openide.explorer > 6.0, org.openide.filesystems > 6.0, org.openide.io, org.openide.loaders, org.openide.modules > 6.0, org.openide.nodes > 6.0, org.openide.options > 6.0, org.openide.text > 6.0, org.openide.util > 6.0, org.openide.windows > 6.0

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: A CVS client library, that substitutes the client side of the native CVS executable.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The CVS Client Library module implements the client side of CVS server connection. Local connections are not supported.
